title: The Three Stooges website
content:
Anyone recognize the two fonts in this image?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174240im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34592.gif)
author: holyhabanero

comments.content:
it looks like the work of a lettering artist ...   
   
Michael Doret and Daniel Pelavin come to mind.   
   
 [http://www.michaeldoret.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174240/http:/www.michaeldoret.com/)   
 [http://www.pelavin.com/thumb.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174240/http:/www.pelavin.com/thumb.html)   
   
Pelavin did ITC Anna   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-anna/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174240/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-anna/)
And of course the bottom line is [Eurostile](%22http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/%22), just in case you were looking for that too.
